title: start
text:
source

say_hello

 say_hello (to)

say hello to somebody

say_hello('ayn')

'hello ayn'



assert say_hello('x') == 'hello x'


test_eq(say_hello('x'), 'hello x')


source


HelloSayer

 HelloSayer (to)

say hello to to using say_hello

source


HelloSayer.say

 HelloSayer.say ()

Do the saying

o = HelloSayer('Alexis')
o.say()

'hello Alexis'
